segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation:
UNH,
Data element 0065 DOCADV 0052 D 0054 93A 0051 UN

segment.name: Business function
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment by means of which the sender must uniquely identify the DOCADV message using its type and number and when necessary its function.

segment.name: Parties to instruction
segment.documentation: BUS, A segment providing information related to the type of documentary credit (i.e. irrevocable or revocable, transferable or not transferable). It may also identify the geographic environment of the documentary credit.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: INP, A segment specifying special instructions and related information from the Applicant to parties to the transaction. It specifies the confirmation instructions and, if applicable, any additional conditions and documents delivery instructions.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date of issuance of the documentary credit, the date and/or time the message is created and, if applicable, the presentation period within which documents are to be presented.

segmentGroup.documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. This may be instructions and information about revolving documentary credits and other supplementary information.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: Segment Group 1: A group of segments identifying the financial institutions and account numbers involved in the documentary credit, their functions and notification references.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: FII, A segment identifying the financial institution(s) associated with the documentary credit, in coded or uncoded form, their functions and account numbers involved.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment specifying reference numbers of parties specified in the leading FII segment.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the leading FII segment to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: Segment Group 2: A group of segments identifying the name and address of each non-financial party involved in thetransaction, their functions and notification references.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying names and addresses of the parties associated with the documentary credit, in coded or uncoded form, and their functions.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment specifying reference numbers of parties specified in the leading NAD segment.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the leading NAD segment to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: Segment Group 3: A group of segments specifying the expiry date of the documentary credit and, if applicable, the place where the documentary credit expires for the presentation of the required documents.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the expiry date of the documentary credit.

segmentGroup.documentation: LOC, A segment specifying the place where the documentary credit expires for the presentation of the required documents.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: Segment Group 4: A group of segments specifying the amount and currency of the documentary credit and, if applicable, any additional amounts covered under the documentary credit. It may also specify the tolerance or specification of the amount(s).

segmentGroup.documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the amount and currency of the documentary credit and, if applicable, any additional amounts covered under the documentary credit.

segment.name: Allowance or charge
segment.documentation: Segment Group 5: A group of segments specifying the tolerance or specification of the amount(s) specified in Segment Group 4.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: ALC, A segment specifying the tolerance or specification of the amount(s) specified in Segment Group 4.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment specifying the amount tolerance in monetary amount.

segmentGroup.documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the amount tolerance in percentage.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: Segment Group 6: A group of segments specifying from where and to where the shipment(s)under the documentary credit must be made and relevant dates for the transport of goods.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment specifying from where and to where shipment(s) under the documentary credit must be made.

segmentGroup.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date or period of shipment.

segment.name: Payment instructions
segment.documentation: Segment Group 7: A group of segments specifying with whom the documentary credit is available.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: PAI, A segment specifying with whom the documentary credit is available.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: FII, A segment identifying, when necessary, the named bank with whom the documentary credit is available in coded or uncoded form.

segmentGroup.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying the city and/or country where the documentary credit is available with any bank.

segment.name: Payment terms basis
segment.documentation: Segment Group 8: A group of segments specifying the method of availability of the documentary credit.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: PAT, A segment specifying the method of availability. It may also specify at which maturity date payment is to be made and how the maturity date is to be determined as well as on whom draft(s) must be drawn and indicate at which usance such time draft(s) must be drawn.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying, when necessary, the party on whom drafts must be drawn.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying, when necessary, a specific maturity date.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment specifying in those cases that the documentary credit should be available by mixed payment (e.g. sight payment and deferred payment) the part of the documentary credit amount that is payable by sight payment, deferred payment, etc.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: PCD, A segment specifying in those cases that the documentary credit should be available by mixed payment (e.g. sight payment and deferred payment) the part of the documentary credit amount in percentage which is payable by sight payment, deferred payment, etc.

segmentGroup.documentation: FTX, A segment specifying how the maturity date is to be determined or indicate at which usance time draft(s) must be drawn in uncoded form.

segment.name: Terms of delivery
segment.documentation: Segment Group 9: A group of segments indicating the terms of delivery.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: TOD, A segment identifying the terms of delivery.

segmentGroup.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying locations relevant to the terms of delivery specified in the leading TOD segment.

segment.name: Transport service requirements
segment.documentation: Segment Group 10: A group of segments specifying generic instructions about transhipments and partial shipments and/or drawings under the documentary credit.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: TSR, A segment specifying whether transhipments and/or partial shipments and/or drawings are allowed or not.

segmentGroup.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a certain city and/or country where transhipments are restricted.

segment.name: Agreement identification
segment.documentation: Segment Group 11: A group of segments specifying the risks covered under an insurance certificate or an insurance policy.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: AGR, A segment specifying the insured risks in coded form.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the value of insurance for an insurance certificate or an insurance policy in monetary amount.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the value of insurance for an insurance certificate or an insurance policy in percentage.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying the city and/or country where claims under an insurance certificate or an insurance policy are payable.

segmentGroup.documentation: FTX, A segment specifying the insured risks in uncoded form.

segment.name: Parties to instruction
segment.documentation: Segment Group 12: A group of segments specifying special instructions and related information from the Applicant to parties identified in Segment Group 1 and/or Segment Group 2.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: INP, A segment identifying the party which is to carry out the instruction and the party to be contacted followed by the instruction in coded form.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment specifying instructions in uncoded form.

segmentGroup.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the earliest and latest dates and/or times by which the specified instructions must be carried out. It will be repeated when more than one date or time is to be provided.

segment.name: Financial charges allocation
segment.documentation: Segment Group 13: A group of segments providing full details of all charges or allowances, and associated taxes, that apply to a particular transaction, together with information as to who bears the charges and to which account they have been directed. A total value of all charges plus allowances may be given for every account to which charges may be directed. Where charges are subject to taxation this may also be specified.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: FCA, A segment specifying the method for allocation of charges and allowances and identifying an account to which such charges or allowances were directed where it is different from the principal account.

segmentGroup.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the basis amount from which charges are calculated, if different from the overall amount of the original documentary credit. It also giving the total value of charges and/or allowances, and associated taxes, that relate to an account for charges/allowances.

segment.name: Allowance or charge
segment.documentation: Segment Group 14: A group of segments providing a detail breakdown of all charges (or allowances) and associated charges (or allowances).

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: ALC, A segment used to provide full details of each charge or allowance for which the Beneficiary is liable. Included are full details of the method of calculating the charge.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the percentage used for calculating the charges (or allowances).

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the amount of charges (or allowances) and/or specifying the basis amount from which charges (or allowances) may be calculated if different from the FCA segment.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment specifying rates related to the charges and allowances.

segmentGroup.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange was fixed.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: Segment Group 15: A group of segments describing any taxes associated with charges and their amount.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: TAX, A segment identifying any taxes related to a specific charge.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the total amount of the tax and the basis of calculation.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment specifying exchange rates.

segmentGroup.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange was fixed.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: Segment Group 16: A group of segments giving references and where necessary, their dates, relating to the description of goods or services (e.g. purchase order, delivery contract) followed by the description of goods or services in coded or uncoded form.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment specifying the reference number of a purchase order, delivery contract, etc.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date related to the reference number specified in the leading RFF segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: FTX, A segment specifying the description of goods or services in free text form.

segment.name: Line item
segment.documentation: Segment Group 17: A group of segments providing the description of goods or services in coded form. It may also include relevant pricing information, identification of the packaging, identification of the mode and means of transport, location and relevant dates for transportation as well as terms of delivery.

segment.name: Item description
segment.documentation: LIN, A segment identifying the line item by the line number and identifying the product or service.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: IMD, A segment for describing the product or service as well as product characteristic. This segment should be used for products or services that cannot be fully identified by a product code or article number.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment enabling the physical measurements of the ordered item to be specified where this is required for full identification of the product. Any measurement must refer to the product in its unpacked form (e.g. plastic film thickness, length, weight).

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the product quantities.

segmentGroup.documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the strength or yield of a product as a percentage (e.g. 80% to indicate the strength of an acid).

segment.name: Price details
segment.documentation: Segment Group 18: A group of segments identifying the relevant pricing information for the goods or services.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: PRI, A segment to specify the price type and amount. The price used in calculation of the line amount will be identified as 'Unit Price'.

segmentGroup.documentation: MOA, A segment giving the total amount for the goods or services.

segment.name: Package
segment.documentation: Segment Group 19: A group of segments identifying the packaging, physical dimensions and marks and number for goods referenced in the line item.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: PAC, A segment specifying the number of packages and the physical type of packaging for the line item (e.g. pallet type).

segment.name: Package identification
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment specifying physical measurements of packages described in the leading PAC segment (e.g. cube or gross weight).

segmentGroup.documentation: PCI, A segment specifying markings and labels used on individual physical units (packages) described in the leading PAC segment.

segment.name: Details of transport
segment.documentation: Segment Group 20: A group of segments identifying the mode and means of transport, location and relevant dates for transportation, relating to the line item, where this is different to or not specified in Segment Group 17.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment specifying the mode and means of transport for the goods item.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying locations relevant to the transport specified in the leading TDT segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the shipping date for the specified location in the associated LOC segment.

segment.name: Terms of delivery
segment.documentation: Segment Group 21: A group of segments indicating the terms of delivery for the line item where this is different to or not specified in Segment Group 18.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: TOD, A segment identifying the terms of delivery.

segmentGroup.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying locations relevant to the terms of delivery specified in the leading TOD segment.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: Segment Group 22: A group of segments specifying the documents required under the documentary credit and the requirements for each document. It may also identify party(ies) related to these requirements.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment specifying the documents required under the documentary credit and the number of copies and originals of each document required.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment specifying, when necessary, the amount of a debit or credit note.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: PCD, A segment specifying, when necessary, the percentage of a debit or credit note.

segmentGroup.documentation: FTX, A segment specifying documentary requirements in uncoded form.

segment.name: Additional information
segment.documentation: Segment Group 23: A segment group specifying the documentary requirements in coded form for documents specified in the DOC segment of Segment Group 12.

segmentGroup.documentation: ALI, A segment specifying the documentary requirements in coded form and, where necessary, the country of origin.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: Segment Group 24: A group of segments identifying party(ies) related to the ALI segment in Segment Group 13. It may also include contact information about each party, when necessary.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying party(ies) related to the ALI segment in Segment Group 13, in coded or uncoded form, and their functions.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the leading NAD segment to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

segment.name: Authentication result
segment.documentation: Segment Group 25: A group of segments specifying details of any authentication (validation) procedures applied to the DOCADV message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: AUT, A segment specifying details of any authentication (validation) procedures applied to the DOCADV message.
